content_en: Beautiful, functional, fast. Design delights. Speed â€‹â€‹in an intuitive, wireless message from one iPhone to another surprised me. content_en: The phone has been using for 2 days. The iPhone like an iPhone everyone challenges that it is not profitable and in total it is a trash, but when you pull out this phone, everyone eats jealousy and everyone looks at it with curiosity with a liquid saliva saying "Ooo you have a new iPhone". By pulling out of the box you immediately feel money. Black mat clearly shows elegance. But the downside that I was afraid of using it without a case, because I still feel like it was to fall. The camera button itself, in my opinion, is what I needed. You don't have to unlock the phone and the camera is ready for reaction. For me it could be a normal button, because these touch functions do not make sense to use. When I used it, I never knew what he would do. Someone will say that I can have a camera under the function button. Yes, but I prefer to have a flashlight, which is fully controlled by the system. You can control the stream whether it is to be focused or dispersed. I see something like this for the first time on the phone. Speakers for me the best of all phone calls, thicket, until you watch. Beautiful display, but Always on Display immediately to turn off. This OLED will burn out soon. Face id is a miracle that you need to know and I will always say it, but for safety I don't start a function with a mask. With the phone we get 3 months Apple TV and iTunes. I am annoyed by all these 5g+. It seems cool because quickly, but sometimes there is no reach and the phone is stupid what to choose. Is 5g+ with poor range, but faster or 5g stronger range, but slower. The manufacturer cannot clearly decide which charger to buy, so he did not give us any cable. On the packaging written 25W in the 30W instructions, they write about 45W on the Internet, and the system limits to 38W. In short, it loads for a long time in my opinion. The camera is perfection. Maybe other brands have better appliances, but let's be honest. You usually use a camera other than factory applications. So Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, Tiktok. And there, the soft manufacturers' soft is focused that the iPhone is best optimized, so you can immediately see that it was recorded on the iPhone. Let's wait for Apple Intelligence, because after the last update you can see this column in the settings, so it's a matter of time. And as we know, Apple may not create new products like Android, but Apple makes this novelty really useful because they will refine it for perfection. What would face ID be without hiding, for example, hiding Mess with a blocked screen, and showing them only when you look at the screen. The battery is much better than in the iPhone 15 Pro, there it was a misunderstanding. Heating and quickly falling. Here is a cold phone and a long battery level. We'll see how with fitness, but since it's not warm, it's probably even 50% better.

content_en: I changed from the iPhone 12 Mini on the iPhone 16 and I must admit that the difference is felt, not only in terms of size, but also in action. I have only been using it for a few days, but I have already noticed a few things that are not always mentioned in reviews. First of all, Carplay now works much faster and more efficiently, and Bluetooth connections with other devices are more stable and fast. The camera takes amazing photos - the quality of photography is at a completely new level. So far I am very happy with this purchase!
